comments.creator: dspikaman@yahoo.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

When a Flash file is set to wmode="transparent" the button will load properly the first time. You can click on buttons, and it will respond. However, if that button takes you to another page, then you click back on your browser, then try to click the Flash object again, it doesn't register the click. You have to first click elsewhere on the page, then click the Flash object again to register the click.
This may or may not be a security issue. I am not sure.


Actual results:

The click is not registered


Expected results:

The click should have been registered by the flash object.
